tool.name: Merge Flags
tool.description: Merge flags with same index together

param.name: input
param.label: Wide Dataset
param.help: Input dataset in wide format and tab separated.CTRL+CLICK to select multiple. If not tab separated see TIP below.

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**TIP:** If your data is not TAB delimited, use *Text Manipulation->Convert* Data sets also must have the same index!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
**What it does**
This tool takes in any number of flag files with the same index and merges them together into one easy-to-read table. Since merging is done by index (e.g. 'compound'), all files must contain the same index. Flag files can also be merged to Wide Format datasets.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
**Input**
- Two or more datasets are required.
**Flags File:**
A flag file corresponding to flagged values of of the wide and design files.::
+----------+---------+---------+--------+-----+ | Compound | flag1 | flag2 | flag3 | ... | +==========+=========+=========+========+=====+ | one | 0 | 0 | 1 | ... | | two | 0 | 0 | 0 | ... | | three | 0 | 1 | 0 | ... | | four | 0 | 1 | 0 | ... | | ... | ... | ... | ... | ... | +----------+---------+---------+---------+-----+
- Indexes must be the same for the data sets
**In addition to your flag datasets, you may provide and optional dataset:**
**Wide Formatted Dataset:** [Optional]
A wide formatted dataset that contains measurements for each sample.::
+----------+---------+---------+---------+-----+ | Compound | sample1 | sample2 | sample3 | ... | +==========+=========+=========+=========+=====+ | one | 10 | 20 | 10 | ... | | two | 5 | 22 | 30 | ... | | three | 30 | 27 | 2 | ... | | four | 32 | 17 | 8 | ... | | ... | ... | ... | ... | ... | +----------+---------+---------+---------+-----+
**NOTE:** The sample IDs must match the sample IDs in the Metadata File (below).
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
**Output Files**
- This tool outputs a TSV file containing all merged flag data sets
